00053 
00054 #ifndef LCP_H
00055 #define LCP_H
00056 
00057 
00058 /*************************
00059 *** PUBLIC DEFINITIONS ***
00060 *************************/
00061 /*
00062  * Options.
00063  */
00064 #define CI_MRU          1       /* Maximum Receive Unit */
00065 #define CI_ASYNCMAP     2       /* Async Control Character Map */
00066 #define CI_AUTHTYPE     3       /* Authentication Type */
00067 #define CI_QUALITY      4       /* Quality Protocol */
00068 #define CI_MAGICNUMBER  5       /* Magic Number */
00069 #define CI_PCOMPRESSION 7       /* Protocol Field Compression */
00070 #define CI_ACCOMPRESSION 8      /* Address/Control Field Compression */
00071 #define CI_CALLBACK     13      /* callback */
00072 #define CI_MRRU         17      /* max reconstructed receive unit; multilink */
00073 #define CI_SSNHF        18      /* short sequence numbers for multilink */
00074 #define CI_EPDISC       19      /* endpoint discriminator */
00075 
00076 /*
00077  * LCP-specific packet types.
00078  */
00079 #define PROTREJ         8       /* Protocol Reject */
00080 #define ECHOREQ         9       /* Echo Request */
00081 #define ECHOREP         10      /* Echo Reply */
00082 #define DISCREQ         11      /* Discard Request */
00083 #define CBCP_OPT        6       /* Use callback control protocol */
00084 
00085 
00086 /************************
00087 *** PUBLIC DATA TYPES ***
00088 ************************/
00089 
00090 /*
00091  * The state of options is described by an lcp_options structure.
00092  */
00093 typedef struct lcp_options {
00094     u_int passive : 1;                  /* Don't die if we don't get a response */
00095     u_int silent : 1;                           /* Wait for the other end to start first */
00096     u_int restart : 1;                  /* Restart vs. exit after close */
00097     u_int neg_mru : 1;                  /* Negotiate the MRU? */
00098     u_int neg_asyncmap : 1;             /* Negotiate the async map? */
00099     u_int neg_upap : 1;                 /* Ask for UPAP authentication? */
00100     u_int neg_chap : 1;                 /* Ask for CHAP authentication? */
00101     u_int neg_magicnumber : 1;  /* Ask for magic number? */
00102     u_int neg_pcompression : 1; /* HDLC Protocol Field Compression? */
00103     u_int neg_accompression : 1;        /* HDLC Address/Control Field Compression? */
00104     u_int neg_lqr : 1;                  /* Negotiate use of Link Quality Reports */
00105     u_int neg_cbcp : 1;                 /* Negotiate use of CBCP */
00106 #ifdef PPP_MULTILINK
00107     u_int neg_mrru : 1;                 /* Negotiate multilink MRRU */
00108     u_int neg_ssnhf : 1;                /* Negotiate short sequence numbers */
00109     u_int neg_endpoint : 1;             /* Negotiate endpoint discriminator */
00110 #endif
00111     u_short mru;                        /* Value of MRU */
00112 #ifdef PPP_MULTILINK
00113     u_short mrru;                       /* Value of MRRU, and multilink enable */
00114 #endif
00115     u_char chap_mdtype;                 /* which MD type (hashing algorithm) */
00116     u32_t asyncmap;                     /* Value of async map */
00117     u32_t magicnumber;
00118     int numloops;                               /* Number of loops during magic number neg. */
00119     u32_t lqr_period;           /* Reporting period for LQR 1/100ths second */
00120 #ifdef PPP_MULTILINK
00121     struct epdisc endpoint;     /* endpoint discriminator */
00122 #endif
00123 } lcp_options;
00124 
00125 /*
00126  * Values for phase from BSD pppd.h based on RFC 1661.
00127  */
00128 typedef enum {
00129         PHASE_DEAD = 0,
00130         PHASE_INITIALIZE,
00131         PHASE_ESTABLISH,
00132         PHASE_AUTHENTICATE,
00133         PHASE_CALLBACK,
00134         PHASE_NETWORK,
00135         PHASE_TERMINATE
00136 } LinkPhase;
00137 
00138 
00139 /*****************************
00140 *** PUBLIC DATA STRUCTURES ***
00141 *****************************/
00142 
00143 extern LinkPhase lcp_phase[NUM_PPP];    /* Phase of link session (RFC 1661) */
00144 extern lcp_options lcp_wantoptions[];
00145 extern lcp_options lcp_gotoptions[];
00146 extern lcp_options lcp_allowoptions[];
00147 extern lcp_options lcp_hisoptions[];
00148 extern ext_accm xmit_accm[];
00149 
00150 
00151 /***********************
00152 *** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ***
00153 ***********************/
00154 
00155 void lcp_init (int);
00156 void lcp_open (int);
00157 void lcp_close (int, char *);
00158 void lcp_lowerup (int);
00159 void lcp_lowerdown (int);
00160 void lcp_sprotrej (int, u_char *, int); /* send protocol reject */
00161 
00162 extern struct protent lcp_protent;
00163 
00164 /* Default number of times we receive our magic number from the peer
00165    before deciding the link is looped-back. */
00166 #define DEFLOOPBACKFAIL 10
00167 
00168 #endif /* LCP_H */
